channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The U.S. just experienced its slowest annual sales of homes since 1995
item.description: The market sputtered amid high mortgage rates, high prices, and homeowners with lower rates who have no plans to move.
